name: Elan.London
tag_list: introduction-agency, dating-agency, matchmaking-agency, dating-agencies-london, dating-agency-london, introduction-agency-london, professional-dating-agencies-london, introduction-agencies-london, professional-introduction-agency-london
overview:
Elan.London is an exclusive Matchmaking Introduction Agency in London. We provide discreet, thoughtful and intelligent introductions for busy, successful, attractive singles.

As a bespoke professional introduction agency we are proactive in finding the perfect match for our clients whilst also arranging elegant events and privileges for our members.
